dataprepÂ¶

Data preparation module for rat brain analysis pipeline.

Provides tools for dataset validation, sampling, file operations, and data management.

Components: - DataReader: Reads and validates dataset directory structures - DataSampler: Creates labeled datasets from image populations using sampling strategies - FileOperations: Manages file structures and multi-channel image processing - SampleSaver: Saves sampled data to disk with proper formatting - SamplingStrategies: Implements various sampling methods (SRS, stratified, model-based) - TracingChecker: Validates dataset structure and provides statistical analysis

AxonSurvey
